name: Network Blog Manager
author: Carlo Gandolfo

sections.description:
Network Blog Manager aspire to be the perfect companion of every Super Administrator of a WP Blog’s Network.

With Network Blog Manager you can find easily every blog in your network due an internal search engine.
Then you can contact the administrator and have a quick overlook of the number of contents (posts, pages, comments) each blog has.

Extensible with an internal plugin support: you can build your own functionality!

Features

Briefly:

  • Ideal companion for Super Admin
  • Internal Search Engine for Blog’s Networks
  • Quick Overlook of Multisite’s Instances
  • Useful SEO Stats: Google and Alexa Ranks, Sites linking in, Average Load Time, Yahoo! Site Links
sections.installation:
1. Download Network Blog Manager
  2. Unzip the ZIP archive
  3. Upload the folder to /wp-content/plugins/
  4. Login into your WordPress Admin Panel
  5. Go to [Plugins/Installed].
  6. Activate ‘Network Blog Manager’ plugin
  7. Now you will have a option under [Dashboard/Blog Manager]
  8. That’s all folks!
sections.faq:

short_description: A simple but powerful blog manager to be used in blog networks. Include an internal search engine, statistics, and some useful tool.

upgrade_notice.0.35: • Added Yahoo! BOSS (Build your Own Search Service) count for site links
upgrade_notice.0.34: • Added Alexa measurements for sites linking in and average load time
upgrade_notice.0.33: • Enabled cache for Google PR and Alexa TR
